players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I find it unfortunate that we've lost Diana so early in the game. Let us all remain vigilant and work together to uncover the truth behind her sudden demise."
Charlie: "I'm deeply saddened by Diana's passing and I urge everyone to stay focused on finding the truth. Let us not jump to conclusions or make accusations without solid evidence."
Bob: "Let's work together to figure out who the mafioso is and make sure they don't kill anyone else."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
